mainText:
The first computer I ever worked on was the first little, tiny 
macintosh...and I was hooked.  Today I make my living working online as 
a web designer & have graduated to the biggest, baddest Mac on the 
market.  Steve Jobs' commitment to style, simplicity, and functionality 
was an inspiration, and it will be a long time before anyone can fill 
those shoes.
author: Kari
